Episode¶

class due.episode.Episode(starter_agent_id, invited_agent_id)[source]¶

An Episode is a sequence of Events issued by Agents

last_event(event_type=None)[source]¶

Returns the last event in the Episode. Optionally, events can be filtered by type.

Parameters:event_type (Event.Type or list of Event.Type) – an event type, or a collection of types
static load(other)[source]¶

Loads an Episode as it was saved by due.episode.Episode.save().

Parameters:other (dict) – the episode to be loaded
Returns:an Episode object representing other
Return type:due.episode.Episode
save()[source]¶

Save the Episode to a serializable object, that can be loaded with due.episode.Episode.load().

Returns:a serializable representation of self
Return type:dict
class due.episode.LiveEpisode(starter_agent, invited_agent)[source]¶

A LiveEpisode is an Episode that is currently under way. That is, new Events can be acted in it.

Parameters:
  • starter_agent (due.agent.Agent) – the Agent which started the Episode
  • invited_agent (due.agent.Agent) – the agent invited to the Episode
add_event(agent, event)[source]¶

Adds an Event to the LiveEpisode.

Parameters:
  • agent (due.agent.Agent) – the agent which acted the Event
  • event (due.event.Event) – the event that was acted by the Agent
